features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you;
Four-way stretch fabrication for enhanced mobility; PFC-free DWR
Crotch gusset for ease of movement
Waistband with adjustable integrated webbing belt
Hand pockets, welt-entry back pockets, and zippered stash pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
